mapper.update: UPDATE B_G2_012 SET EOBH=#{0} WHERE ID=#{1}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM B_G2_01103 WHERE MAINID=#{0} AND WXXMID=#{1}
mapper.select: SELECT G2012.ID WXXMID, --维修项目编号 G2012.RWH, --任务号 G2012.BB WXXMBB, --维修项目版本 G2012.CKH, --参考号 G2012.CKWJ, --参考文件 G2012.JHGS_RS, G2012.JHGS_XSS, (G2012.JHGS_RS * G2012.JHGS_XSS) JHGS, --计划工时 G201203.FJZCH, G2012.SYX --适用性 FROM B_G2_01103 G201103 JOIN B_G2_012 G2012 ON G2012.YXBS = 1 AND G2012.ID = G201103.XGWXXMID AND G201103.MAINID =#{wxfaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND G201103.WXXMID =#{wxxmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN (SELECT G201203.MAINID WXXMID, WM_CONCAT(G201203.FJZCH) FJZCH FROM B_G2_01203 G201203 GROUP BY G201203.MAINID) G201203 ON G201203.WXXMID = G2012.ID ORDER BY G2012.RWH

SELECT G2012.ID WXXMID, --维修项目编号 G2012.RWH, --任务号 G2012.BB WXXMBB, --维修项目版本 G2012.CKH, --参考号 G2012.CKWJ, --参考文件 G2012.JHGS_RS, G2012.JHGS_XSS, G201203.FJZCH, (G2012.JHGS_RS * G2012.JHGS_XSS) JHGS, --计划工时 CASE WHEN G2012.SYX = '00000' THEN '00000' WHEN G2012.SYX = '-' THEN G201203.FJZCH ELSE '' END SYX --适用性 FROM B_G2_01102 G201102 JOIN B_G2_012 G2012 ON G2012.YXBS = 1 AND G2012.WXXMLX!=4 --过滤掉定检包 AND G2012.ID = G201102.WXXMID AND G201102.MAINID = #{wxfaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN (SELECT G201203.MAINID WXXMID, WM_CONCAT(G201203.FJZCH) FJZCH FROM B_G2_01203 G201203 JOIN B_G2_012 G2012_1 ON G2012_1.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND G2012_1.JX =#{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND G2012_1.ID = G201203.MAINID GROUP BY G201203.MAINID) G201203 ON G201203.WXXMID = G2012.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( UPPER(G2012.RWH) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or UPPER(G2012.CKH) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') )
AND G2012.RWH NOT IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY G2012.RWH
